cafes.title: YakiniQ Cafe
cafes.description: Near a the Kinokuniya bookstore. I sometimes grab a manga, walk over to the cafe, and sit outside with a Lavender latte.

cafes.title: Robin Cafe
cafes.description: This place also makes their own homemade juices!

cafes.title: Holy Gelato
cafes.description: Near Golden Gate, nice to sit before I go down to the Botanical Garden.

cafes.title: Limoncello's
cafes.description: Great sandwiches! Come here for all of your Italian grocery shopping needs.
